top_comments.comment: 13:27 Dude, I laughed and snorted so hard my cat is not amused with me because he was just stretched out chilling right in front of me on my desk.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I will accept either D videos or 64DD videos.
Absolutely stoked to have found this channel. Magnificent content/10
Really amazed the camera worked with the gamecube at all
How does uncle Derek know about all these crazy features.
We want N64 DD on Nintendo switch
Sorry Derek but it doesn't look like you're packing DDs. Large Bs maybe?
is it weird I own every piece needed to do this too? lol
That composite cartridge input thing is mental
I literally look forward to these the same way I used to loom forward to shows as a kidn
Is it me, or is the audio mix off for anybody else? Derek's voice in particular seems to be way louder in the right channel.

Bless you Uncle Derek for going above and beyond the realms of stupid so we can have things that were never asked, answered.

I know that sounds rude- I promise you it's positive because,  this is some entertaining levels of dumb even for SSFF and I love it.
Like, I don't even want to know how much this would have cost to try TODAY- this stuff is only getting more and more expensive after all.
6:15 - This whole next part has me in tears dude 🤣
14:02 The reason I love you is because I immediately thought of seaman when you mentioned the mic icon.  <3
Fun pointless factoid: At 3:11 the woman with her face inside Perfect Dark is Andrea Ball, former staff writer & later editor of N64 Magazine in the UK. Incredible magazine from back in the day!
13:27 Dude, I laughed and snorted so hard my cat is not amused with me because he was just stretched out chilling right in front of me on my desk.
16:09 that sound was way too early
Please show me more of the DDz Nuts.
